alert.note: Alert for Amite; Northern Hancock; Pearl River; Pike; Southern Hancock; Walthall; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 3:23AM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain and freezing drizzle expected. Total ice accumulations of several hundredths of an inch. For the Wind Chill Advisories, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as zero to 5 above zero. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Pointe Coupee and West Feliciana Parishes. In Mississippi, Wilkinson County. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST today. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Sidewalks and roads, particularly bridges, overpasses, and lesser traveled secondary roads will become slippery. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute as well as the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of rain, light freezing rain and freezing drizzle is currently moving across portions of this area this morning. Precipitation ends from west to east not too long after sunrise this morning, but remaining water on roads freezing icy roads are likely to continue into the morning commute as any remaining water on roads could quickly freezing.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Amite; Northern Hancock; Pearl River; Pike; Southern Hancock; Walthall; Wilkinson
